name: Chestnut Climber
description:
A, D - move left and right

Click - teleport to a chestnut.
(tip: teleporting conserves momentum!)

---

Ches' best friend, Lord Warnswick the snail, is always getting lost (he's just a really good climber, you see).

Help Ches reunite with his buddy by climbing leaves, acorns, and pinecones up through the forest they call home.

---

This is a submission for the 2022 Cozy Fall Game jam

---

Programming and Level Design - Rooksy

Music and Sound Effects - paperaviator

Art and Character Design - Xubchas
